title: Charles Edwards, founder of Capriole Investments: State of the Bitcoin Market
description: Blockware Lead Insights Analyst Will Clemente speaks with Charles Edwards, founder of Capriole Investments for our weekly interview Podcast/YouTube channel series. Can now find our podcast on Spotify, Apple, and Google Podcasts as well!
dc:creator: Joe Burnett
